EVID.rationale: Primary sources: FOMC minutes, BLS releases, Fed H.15.

MECH.rationale: Transmission mechanism traced through Taylor Rule model.

INC.rationale: Fed member incentive constraints documented by mandate.

RISK.rationale: Tail risk scenarios quantified via probability-weighted paths.

SPEC.rationale: Claim-level specificity high; date-stamped data throughout.
